mapper.select: SELECT username,password FROM user WHERE username=#{username}

select s.RESOURCE_NAME FROM user u,role r,resource s,user_role_ref urr,resource_role_ref rrr WHERE u.username=#{username} AND u.itemCode=urr.USER_CODE AND urr.ROLE_CODE=r.itemCode AND r.itemCode=rrr.ROLE_CODE AND rrr.RESOURCE_CODE=s.itemCode
